title: (x) Muse logo sans - Frutiger {Patricia}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153135im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/muse-live-4900841_4235.jpg)

What font does it use?

Thank you in advance.  
Cheers.

 [‹ (x) DIN-esque, Trade Gothic-esque sans serif - similar to Wilma {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36374 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Condensed blackletter in Sombrio/Ride logos by Hydro74 - Sky Clad Gothic {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153135/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thestaticbot

comments.content: 3 minutes, is that a personal best Patty?

Nah - I’ve done 1 minute once or twice. But that’s just the timing of when I happen to glance at the site.

The three minute time lag had to do with going to WhatTheFont which was faster than paging thru my sans selections for those 4 characters.

OKAY, now I feel so ashamed, why I didn’t thought of this, so obvious, thank you pattyfab!

cheers.
